ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:0.2_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:0.5_0: The training rule on covering the head
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.2_0: he allowed the itch-covering cloth for the monks.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.3_0: When the monks from the group of six knew that
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.4_0: Knowing this, the monks from the group of six wore itch covers that were inappropriate in size.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.5_0: and then walked back in front of them.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.6_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.7_0: “How can the monks from the group of six wear such itch covers?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that you do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.11_0: “... Foolish men, how can you do this?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.13_0: the Buddha said, “And so, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.14.1_0: ‘If a monk is having an itch-covering cloth made, it should be made the right size.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.15_0: This is the right size: two standard handspans long and one-and-a-half wide.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.16_0: If one uses them beyond that, one commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.2_0: it is for the purpose of covering an itch or a boil or a running sore or a carbuncle, below the navel and above the knees.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.4_0: making it himself or having someone else make it, it should be made the right size.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.5_0: This is the right size: two standard handspans long and one-and-a-half wide.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.6_0: If she makes one or has one made that exceeds that, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.7_0: When she obtains it, it is to be cut down, and she is then to confess an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.8.1_0: If she finishes what she began herself, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.9_0: If she has others finish what she began herself, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.10_0: If she finishes herself what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.11_0: If she has others finish what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.12_0: If she makes one or has one made for the benefit of someone else, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.13_0: If she obtains one that was made by someone else and then uses it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.15_0: if she makes it the right size;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.16_0: if she makes it less than the right size;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.17_0: if she obtains one made by someone else that exceeds the right size and she cuts it down before using it;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.18_0: if she makes a canopy, a floor cover, a cloth screen, a mattress, or a pillow;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.21_0: The eighth rule, the training rule on itch covers, is finished.
